topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Sound/Audio :: CD Audio :: CD Playing

name: PlayerX A Multiplatform Media Frontend

screenshots.caption: Player X running on Win XP
Player X running on Linux FC3

short_description: PlayerX is a Skin and Plugin based media front end for playback in Windows and Linux systems. It builds on ideas from WinAmp, XINE, and others. What makes PlayerX unique is its multiplatform support built on top of GTK.
